modules.title: Introduction to Ethical Hacking
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of ethical hacking, legal frameworks, and why Python is the preferred language for security professionals.

modules.title: Python Networking Fundamentals
modules.description: Master Python networking concepts, socket programming, and network protocols essential for ethical hacking.

modules.title: Network Scanning and Reconnaissance
modules.description: Build custom network scanners, perform port scanning, and gather intelligence using Python tools.

modules.title: Web Application Security Testing
modules.description: Learn to test web applications for vulnerabilities using Python scripts and automated tools.

modules.title: Password Security and Cracking Techniques
modules.description: Understand password security, implement cracking algorithms, and learn defensive strategies.
